page.title: 08SCORTON FEAST
page.content: Scorton Feast started in 1700, and used to be a one-day event.It started at Bolton church, inside the church porch.The men drank a lot of beer which was kept in barrels in the porch so that the witches could not poison it before the feast.The entertainment was mainly races which started at the church porch.The only holiday people were allowed was on a feast day. Nowadays Scorton Feast lasts for four days in mid August and begins with a cricket match on the Sunday.The sports,the fancy dress and the fair take place on the green;the gymkhana,sulky racing and BMX races are at Mr.Barkers farm;the childrens tea and the disco is in the institute,and the gymnasium is used for the flower and produce show.
